name: places/ChIJXdyhF5RZwokRNmxBc1ysCQg
formattedAddress: 33 Greenwich Ave, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 33 Greenwich Ave, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text:
Waverly Leather & Luggage is fantastic!
I went there for an unique, complicated project of fixing a torn leather vintage director’s chair. I had been quoted some astronomical prices or simply told “no” from other places prior to this stop.
I was feeling a little hopeless when I walked in, but Sam completely changed that outlook within a minute.  He gave me detailed description of the repair with options & transparent (very reasonable) pricing. He turned the job around in about a day. It was beyond anything I would’ve imagined & stronger than new! Its refreshing to see there are businesses out there that treat both the services they provide & their customers with exceptional care. I highly recommend Waverly for any repairs or leather needs you have. You’ll be happy you stopped in!

originalText.text:
I have lived in the neighborhood 33 years and I don't think there's a better place to go for leather/luggage. I absolutely recommend!

Came here looking for a small travel bag for an upcoming work trip. Left with an amazing bag for a great price, a lovely extra piece, and the pleasure of having met Sam, The Leather Man.

The shop is cozy and full of various options and Sam matches the environment with his welcoming nature and helpful demeanor and suggestions as I explained what I was looking for.

I greatly enjoyed his shop, his company, and the hand-crafted products he offers. I highly recommend this location to anyone in need of leather, luggage, or repairs.

Very, very pleased with the whole experience. Thanks again, Sam!

originalText.text: By far the best customer service experience I have had in Manhattan. Sam is amazing and repaired a very old leather jacket of mine that was nearly beyond saving. This spot is a true gem and he also fixed all the buttons on the jacket for free! Will be returning.

text.text: By far the best customer service experience I have had in Manhattan. Sam is amazing and repaired a very old leather jacket of mine that was nearly beyond saving. This spot is a true gem and he also fixed all the buttons on the jacket for free! Will be returning.

originalText.text: Sam at Waverly Leather & Luggage is professional, efficient, and meticulous. I had a broken zipper on a piece of travel luggage very important to me and was able to get it repaired the same day. Excellent service and would recommend this business for any leather/luggage or repair needs.

text.text: Sam at Waverly Leather & Luggage is professional, efficient, and meticulous. I had a broken zipper on a piece of travel luggage very important to me and was able to get it repaired the same day. Excellent service and would recommend this business for any leather/luggage or repair needs.

originalText.text: On a trip to NYC, I had the buckle of my only belt break and needed to replace so that I didn't have to face customers with my pants hanging down to my knees. I found Sam on Google, called him and he said he could help. I Ubered to his shop and he quoted me $65 to make the repair which included a "rush" charge. However, when got there, he did the repair for $40 and didn't include the $25 rush fee, But I paid it anyway, as he is a genuine and hard working man as well as a very fine gentleman.
